data.text: Then Zophar, from the Naamah area, said this to Job:
“◄Should no one answer all that you have said?/Someone should certainly answer all that you have said.► [RHQ]
Job, ◄should your babbling cause us to be silent?/your babbling should certainly not cause us to be silent.► [RHQ]
You say, ‘What I say is true;
But I wish/desire that God would talk
God knows everything about everything,
“Tell me, will you ever be able to find out the things about God that are very difficult to understand?
What there is to know about God is greater than the distance from earth to heaven;
What there is to know about God is wider than the earth
“If God comes to you and puts you in prison and then brings you to a court,
He knows which people are worthless;
Stupid people like you will start to become wise [SAR]
“Job, repent [IDM];
If you have done evil things, stop doing them;
If you do what I have said, surely you will lift up your head because you will not be ashamed;
You will forget all your troubles;
Your troubles will be ended, like the darkness ends at the dawn;
You will feel safe/secure, because you will confidently expect that good things will happen to you;
You will lie down, and no one will cause you to be afraid.
But wicked people [SYN] will not be able to understand why bad things are happening to them;
